channel.title: Avenged Sevenfold
channel.description:
Well, this is a thread to talk about worlds most melodious band. I used to be a hardcore Iron Maiden fan, but I realy got to say they suprised me in a very good way. What do you think about them? What about Synyster Gates (guitar)? Or Zacky Vengeance (guitar)? And if you don't believe me : [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_TEKh0ZnTOs]Bat country guitar lesson, with Synyster Gates and Zacky Vengeance[/url]
Post anything you know about A7x! But please, do not spam. Just because this is the music section, it doesn't mean it's the spam section...
Greetz,
Jens
btw:[url=http://www.avengedsevenfold.com]Avenged Sevenfold website[/url]

Yes Bat Country is one of my favo songs too, but I got like 40 , 50 maybe more songs, and I love them all, it’s like … never happend before to me lol

item.description:

Here’s a cool youtube vid : Bat country guitar lesson, with Synyster Gates and Zacky Vengeance =)
